data.message: 😭 I live in Minehead West somerset. Due to work and not being able to drive right now there is no way I can get to Swansea or Plymouth. I thought you were in Exeter on December 10th? I could have traveled there. Gutted as I’m not going to get to see it yet some places have it multiple times. Can you not add either Taunton, Bridgwater, street or Exeter ? So many here will miss out as there’s a huge gap either side of where we live.

replies.message: Hi Nina, each year, we try to cover as much of the country as we can but unfortunately, we can't visit every single town and city. To ensure that as many people as possible get the opportunity to experience the tour we update the route every year to add new locations.
